Title: Given I'm on the homepaged and not logged in When I visit the site I see a splash page with banner and quotes
Given I'm on the homepage When I click on "JOIN" Then I see a registration page
Given I'm on the registration page When I fill it out entirely and click "Register" Then I'm informed that I registered
Description: Do not store the user's password in plain text!

Title: Given I'm registered When I fill out the Login form and click "Login" Then I'm logged in
Description: To start, I only see my first and last name

Title: Given I'm logged in When I click "Logout" Then I'm Logged out
Given I've logged in When I click on my name Then I can edit my profile
Description:
Same view as the register page. Pre-filled with my previous answers. Same registration validations apply.

Users cannot edit the profiles for other users.

Title: Given I'm registered When I log in Then I see a place to post my rant
When I fill out the rant form Then my rant is posted under "My Rants"
Given I've created a rant When I click delete Then it deletes the rant
Description: Users can only delete rants that they created.

Title: Given another user has posted a rant When I go to my homepage Then I see it under "Latest Rants"
Given there is another user When I click follow on the user from the homepage Then I can view that user under the "Following" page
Given I've followed a user and I'm viewing one of their rants on the homepage When I click "Unfollow" Then the user no longer shows up on the "Following" page
Given I'm on the "Following" page When I click "Unfollow" Then I no longer follow that user
Given there is a rant by another user When I click on the body of the rant Then I'm taken to view the rant
Given I'm on the homepage and I'm viewing a rant When I click on a user's name Then I see their profile
Description: To start, I just see their bio

Title: Given I'm viewing a specific rant When I click on the user's name Then I see their profile
When I click to view a user's profile Then I can see all of their rants
Given I'm on a user's profile page When I click "follow" Then that user shows up on the "Following" page
Given I've followed a user and I'm viewing their profile When I click "Unfollow" Then the user no longer shows up on the "Following" page
When I've filled our an incomplete registration form Then I am shown a form with errors
Description:
All fields are required.

Username must be unique
Password must be 8 characters

Title: When I fill out the rant form incorrectly Then I see errors
Description:
Both title and body required.

Title must be less than 50 characters
Body must be greater than 140 characters

Title: When I fill in the Login form incorrectly Then I see a general message telling me it failed
Description:
Username is required
Password is required

If username and password don't match, then I see a message saying "Login failed"

Title: As an anonymous user, Given that I've never registered and seen the homepage before when I revisit the homepage then I see a "Welcome back" message
Given I'm viewing a specific rant When I click "Favorite" Then that rant becomes favorited
When I view a user's profile Then their rants are ordered by most favorites
When I search by last name Then I see all rants by users with that exact last name
Exercise Goal
Given I'm viewing my homepage When I click favorite on a rant Then I can see that rant on my "Favorites" page
Given I've favorited a rant When I click "Unfavorite" Then it unfavorites that rant
Description: Make sure you check the mockups for all the places this can show up!

Title: Given I'm viewing a rant When I click favorite Then it favorites that rant
When I'm mentioned in a rant Then I see a "Mentioned" section with that rant on my homepage
Description: You mention someone by using the syntax `@username`

Title: When I search by first name Then I see all rants by that first name
When I search by username Then I see all rants by that username
Extended Goal
Given I'm on the registration page When I upload an image to the form Then I see my image wherever my name shows up
Given I'm on the edit profile page When I add a profile image and save Then I see that image anywhere my name shows up
When I search by a certain piece of text Then I see all rants that have a title that contains that text
When I search by a bit of text Then I see all rants whose body's contain that bit of text
When I'm filling out a rant and I use Markdown Then I see that markdown rendered for my rant
Life Goal
